title: Kirk Minihane Empties the Mailbag
description:
Kirk Minihane is a man of the people. So every once in a while he likes to answer all the listeners' questions. On today's mailbag edition of the show, Minihane talks about his financial relationship with Barstool Sports, fields complaints from Blind Mike and Steve Robinson, and previews future developments in the Kirk Minihane World. Plus we learn about that time Mike masturbated in a public restroom.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
